forum.content:
HELLO EVERYONE
I AM TAROTSHOW.
SOMETIMES WE CAN LEARN IT BY APP.
FOR EXAMPLE, APP RADIO, BBC RADIO, LIKE RADIO, OR OTHER COUNTRIES RADIO.

DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT.

FIRST, WE JUST PRACTICE TO CATCH KEY WORD ON RADIO.

THEN, AFTER SEVERAL WEEKS,
WE CAN TRY TO GET THE MAIN IDEA IN A TOPIC ON RADIO.

FINALLY, WE CAN KNOW MORE AND MORE SENTENCES. AND WE CAN TOTALLY KNOW THE TOPIC.

EVERYONE HASE DIFFERENT ABILITY.
SO, DON'T BE SHINE OR BE AFRAID OF ENGLISH.

JUST TRY IT.
AND HAVE FUN.
TOUCH ENGLISH EVERY DAY.
forum.title: LEARNING ENGLISH BY APP
